import { useState } from "react" const containerStyle = { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '16px' } const starContainerStyle = { display: 'flex', gap: '4px' } function Star({ onRate, full, onHoverIn, onHoverOut, colour = 'orange', size = 48 }) { const starStyle = { cursor: 'pointer', width: `${size}`, height: `${size}`, display: 'block', color: `${colour}` } return ( < span role="button" style={starStyle} onClick={onRate} onMouseEnter={onHoverIn} onMouseLeave={onHoverOut}> { full ? : } ) } export default function StarRating({ maxRating = 10, colour = 'orange', size = 40 }) { const [rating, setRating] = useState(0); const [tempRating, setTempRating] = useState(0); const textStyle = { lineHeight: '1', margin: '0', color: `${colour}`, fontSize: `${size}px` } function handleRating(rating) { setRating(rating); } return (
{Array.from({ length: maxRating }, (_, i) => setTempRating(i + 1)} onHoverOut={() => setTempRating(0)} onRate={() => handleRating(i + 1)} full={tempRating ? tempRating >= i + 1 : rating >= i + 1} key={i} />)}

{tempRating || rating || ''}

) } /* FULL STAR EMPTY STAR */
